Key Match Events: David Brooks scored the first goal in the 3rd minute
Neco Williams scored the second goal in the 38th minute
Teemu Pukki scored for Finland in the 45th minute
Brennan Johnson scored the third goal in the 47th minute
Dan James scored the fourth and final goal in the 87th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Rob Page emphasized the need to bring their 'A-game' and deliver the same values that get them success
Finland coach Markku Kanerva noted that Wales are a good side with very good talented individuals and a lot of Premier League players
Wales finished third in their Euro 2024 qualifying group behind Denmark and Slovenia, while Finland finished third behind Denmark and Slovenia as well
Post-Match Reflections: Wales qualified for a play-off final against Poland on Tuesday, also in Cardiff
The winner of that match will book their place at the Euros
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales took a major step towards this summerâ€™s European Championship in Germany
The match was broadcast live on S4C and BBC Radio 5 live
